Welcome Adventurers!
This week's patch is a smaller one but nevertheless, it will add some really great additions to the game. The Life Leech attribute is coming to the game with a couple of new weapons.
Improvements: - Added a new attribute called Life Leech into the game. - Buffed the Vampire Lord a little bit because we found it too easy to kill. - Added a new spell called 'Might' to the game. It's increasing the melee attack/damage and defense capabilities of the character based on its willpower. - Added five new weapons as drops to the Vampire Lord. - Added two new quests to the Witchhunter's Guild.
Sincerely, Daggers & Sorcery Team
